init.help:
Initialize Persona2 configuration by creating the default configuration file.
If the file already exists, it will not be modified.

Use the --force option to force reset the configuration.
init.exists_force: Configuration already exists at %s. Use --force to overwrite
init.invalid_choice: Invalid choice. Please choose a number between 1 and %d.

add.help:
Add a new profile by cloning a Git repository.
The profile name can be extracted from the URL if not provided.
add.error_exists: A profile with this name already exists
add.error_profile: A profile with the name '%s' already exists

list.help: List all available profiles and their information
list.title: Available profiles:

switch.help: Switch to a profile and create symbolic links to its configuration files

remove.help: Remove a profile and its symbolic links
remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove profile '%s'? (y/n)

update.help: Update all profiles or a specific profile from their repositories

self_update.description: Update Persona2 to the latest version
self_update.long_description: Downloads and installs the latest version of Persona2 from GitHub.
self_update.up_to_date: You are already using the latest version: %s

common.long_description:
Persona2 is a Git profile manager that allows you to manage different profiles by cloning repositories.
Profiles can be easily switched and updated.
